```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(openlayers)
```

# Controls

Get some data ...

```{r}
fn <- system.file("geojson/earthquakes_1-0_hour.geojson",
                  package = "openlayers")
```

## Overview map

```{r}
map <- ol() %>% add_osm_tiles() %>%
  add_geojson(filename = fn, style = circle_style())

map %>% add_overview_map(collapsed = FALSE)
```

## Mouse position

```{r, eval=FALSE}
map %>% add_mouse_position()
```

## Full screen

```{r, eval=TRUE}
map %>% add_full_screen()
```
